name: Smitty the unplayed RPG
description:
Smitty the unplayed RPG is an oniric-action adventure. You are Chak who is lost in this strange world. Without any clue about what is happening, you need to overcome the guards' attack and safely traverse this land seeking for pieces of information... What kind of bond does Chak has with that mysterious rubber duck?

Smitty the unplayed RPG is the third of a series of mini games that I'm building for my personal portfolio. For now it is limited to one level, but based on your interest I might develop more levels in the future. Therefore, it is free and I appreciate any feedback that you might have.

You can play this game by:

  • Using your mouse and click to interact with the world, speak with other characters, pickup items or attack the enemies.
  • Keep an eye on your health, otherwise you will be defetead.
  • Items in the world will respawn after certain time (weapons and health potions).
  • The more enemies you defeat, the more experience points you will get to level up.

Thanks for playing and enjoy! :D
